Package me.julb.applications.bookmark.controllers

Class ItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.julb.applications.bookmark.controllers.ItemController
  • @RestController
@Validated
@RequestMapping(path="/users/{userId}/items",
                produces="application/json")
public class ItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    The rest controller to manage items of a user.

                   @Identifier java.lang.String userId,
